document_title: Erectile dysfunction: Causes, symptoms, treatment and prevention
subsection_content:
People with erectile dysfunction will have signs such as: (2)
Loss of sexual desire. The penis is soft and cannot meet the normal physiological needs of the partner; Men still have the desire to have intercourse. However, when interacting with women, despite using many stimulation methods, the penis cannot become erect; Appearance of erratic erection of the penis, not according to the needs of men.; ● Although the penis is erect, it does not last long enough to have sex. In some cases, when the penis is inserted into a woman's body, it softens on its own, causing excitement to quickly disappear.
